description:
Great location in Midtown East. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. With easy access to Grand Central and the 4, 5, 6, 7 trains as well as Shuttle to Times Square. Walking distance to famous landmarks such as Empire State Building, Chrysler Building, Times Square, and many more!

This is a walk up on the third floor -- please be aware of going up the stairs!

Close to 4, 5, 6, 7, Shuttle Train
Close to Metro North Train
You're in Manhattan -- you can walk anywhere!
name: Cozy Apartment In Midtown Manhattan Walk Up
